header.title: Canada Salary Calculator
header.subtitle: Calculate your take-home pay with accurate Canadian tax calculations

intro.paragraph1: Canadian salary calculations include federal income tax, provincial income tax, Canada Pension Plan (CPP), and Employment Insurance (EI) contributions. Tax rates vary significantly by province.
intro.paragraph2: Enter your gross salary and province to get accurate calculations based on current Canadian tax rates.
